targets.query: SELECT mean("cpucore") FROM "$host.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("min1") FROM "$host.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("min5") FROM "$host.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("min15") FROM "$host.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("min15") FROM "$host.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "$host.processcount" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("user") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("system") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("iowait") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "$host.mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "$host.mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("$interface.rx")/mean("$interface.time_since_update")*8 FROM "$host.network" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("$interface.tx")/mean("$interface.time_since_update")*8*-1 FROM "$host.network" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "$host.memswap" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "$host.memswap" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("$disk.read_bytes")/mean("$disk.time_since_update") FROM "$host.diskio" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("$disk.write_bytes")/mean("$disk.time_since_update") FROM "$host.diskio" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("/.size") FROM "$host.fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("/.used") FROM "$host.fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("/.percent") FROM "$host.fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("/boot/efi.percent") FROM "$host.fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("$container.cpu_percent") FROM "$host.docker" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("$container.memory_usage") FROM "$host.docker" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("user") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT min("user") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT max("user") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("system") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT min("system") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT max("system") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("iowait") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT min("iowait") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT max("iowait") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("ctx_switches") / mean("time_since_update") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("interrupts") / mean("time_since_update") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
